snippet: Kevin Arquit will rejoin former colleagues when he becomes co-head of Weil, Gotshal & Manges’s antitrust practice....
abstract: Law firm Weil, Gotshal & Manges announces plan to hire Kevin J Arquit to join Steven A Newborn as leaders of antitrust division; men have worked together before at firm Rogers & Wells.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: Kevin Arquit will rejoin former colleagues when he becomes co-head of Weil, Gotshal & Manges’s antitrust practice.

headline.main: Prominent Antitrust Lawyer to Join Weil Gotshal
headline.print_headline: Prominent Antitrust Lawyer Is Hired by New York Firm
